required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of TQB2858 Injection in Subjects With Advanced Malignancy
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Trial to Evaluate Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of TQB2858 Injection in Subjects With Advanced Malignancy

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: A phase I clinical trial of tolerability and pharmacokinetics of TQB2858 injection in subjects with advanced malignancy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to up to two years
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of patients whose tumors shrank by a certain amount and remained for a certain period of time, including complete response (CR) and partial response (PR) .

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to up to two years
secondary_outcome.description: The period from the first use of the drug to disease progression or death (whichever occurs first)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to up to two years
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects whose tumors shrink or remain stable for a certain period, including complete remission（CR）, partial remission（PR） and stable disease（SD）

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to up to two years
secondary_outcome.description: The period from firstly-recorded objective tumor response (CR or PR) to firstly-recorded objective tumor progression or death due to any cause (whichever occurs first) .

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to up to two years
secondary_outcome.description: The period from the first use of the drug to death from all causes. For subjects who are still alive at the last follow-up, the OS will be counted as data censored based on the last follow-up. For subjects who are lost follow-up, the OS will be counted as data censored based on the last confirmed survival time before being lost to follow-up.

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all adverse events (AE), serious adverse events (SAE), and treatment-related adverse events (TEAEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to up to two years
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events refer to all adverse medical events that occur after a patient or clinical trial subject receives an experimental drug, which can be expressed as symptoms, signs, diseases, or abnormalities in laboratory tests, but are not necessarily related to the treatment of the experimental drug. Serious adverse events refer to adverse medical conditions such as death, life threatening, permanent or severe disability, loss of function, the need for hospitalization or prolonged hospitalization , and congenital abnormalities or birth defects after the subject receives the experimental drug.

arm_group.description: TQB2858 injection: once every 3 weeks, 1800mg each time, intravenous infusion. Until the disease progression or unbearable adverse events occur.

intervention.description: TQB2858 is an anti-programmed death ligand 1（PD-L1）/transforming growth factor-β （TGF-β） bi-functional fusion protein.

facility.name: Affiliated Tumor Hospital of Guangxi Medical University
The Third Affiliated Hospital of Qiqihar Medical College
